title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Is BioWare's Biggest Steam Launch Ever - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.01.24
description:
New World Aeternum is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC! Get it here: https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Phasmophobia is out now PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Buy it now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673 
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010 

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST is Greg’s 1-man walkthrough of his Dragon Age: The Veilguard Journal!
 - Then, Greg and Andy are taking you on a magical quest with Nick the Dwarf! We’re heading into the world of Dragon Age: The Veilguard to satisfy our thirst for gold, power, and maybe even a romance or two? The adventure comes in part, thanks to our friends at NVIDIA GeForce.
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway about single player DLC.
 - And you can get MCU In Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.

Time Stamps:

00:04:24 - Housekeeping
                     -  The Roper Report   -
00:07:22 - Dragon Age: The Veilguard Is BioWare's Biggest Launch Ever On Steam
00:16:31 - PlayStation Tidbits
00:30:07 - Monster Hunter Wilds Beta Begins With Almost 500,000 Concurrent Players On Steam
00:38:52 - Let’s take a look at Death Stranding 2’s WIP Title Screen
00:42:31 - Meta's AR/VR Reality Labs division records further losses of $4.4 billion
00:48:46 - Pokemon TCG Pocket Players Think Farfetch’d Is OP
00:53:02 - Wee News!
00:57:31 - SuperChats & You‘re Wrong
